string-array.name: cityDesc
string-array.item: Addis Ababa, the capital city of Ethiopia, exudes a unique charm as a bustling metropolis nestled in the country\'s highlands.
Berlin, the vibrant capital of Germany, encapsulates a harmonious blend of history, culture, and innovation.
Abu Dhabi, the capital of the United Arab Emirates, epitomizes opulence and modernity in the heart of the Arabian Desert.
Frankfurt, a bustling metropolis in the heart of Germany, stands as a vibrant financial and cultural hub. Skyscrapers dominate its skyline.
Tokyo, the pulsating capital of Japan, is a mesmerizing blend of ultramodern innovation and deep-rooted tradition.
